title: Liberty Plaza re-opened after being shut over weekend
snippet: The Liberty Plaza Shopping Complex in Kollupitiya had been closed for the weekend after several persons were detected with the COVID-19, the area Medical Officer of Health (MOH) said.

title: 48 more die of COVID-19: Death toll surges to 4,147
snippet: A total of 48 more COVID-19 related deaths that occurred yesterday (25) were confirmed by the Director-General of Health Services today pushing the death toll to 4,147.
